<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.06

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> ofp

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value> 1.99

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the machine (executing the command) is the server in a multiplayer game or is running single player. It will return [[true]] for both dedicated and player-hosted server.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> See also [[Multiplayer Scripting#Different machines and how to target them|Multiplayer Scripting/machines]]. </value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[isServer]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (![[isServer]]) [[exitWith]] {};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isDedicated]], [[isMultiplayer]], [[hasInterface]], [[local]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on April 8, 2011</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Igneous01|Igneous01]]</dt>
<dd class="note">'''Before <template><title>arma3</title></template> and server-only triggers:''' You can use [[isServer]] inside the condition of a trigger to have the trigger activate only for the server. All other conditions for the trigger will be checked across all machines, but it will only activate the trigger created on the server. For example: <code>this && [[isServer]]</code>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on December 21, 2014 - 14:51 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
<code>[[if]] ([[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>run on dedicated server only</value></part></template>
};

[[if]] ([[isServer]]) [[then]] {
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>run on dedicated server or player host</value></part></template>
};

[[if]] ([[hasInterface]]) [[then]] {
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>run on all player clients incl. player host</value></part></template>
};

[[if]] (![[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>run on all player clients incl. player host and headless clients</value></part></template>
};

[[if]] (![[isServer]]) [[then]] {
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>run on all player clients incl. headless clients but not player host</value></part></template>
};

[[if]] (![[hasInterface]]) [[then]] {
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>run on headless clients and dedicated server</value></part></template>
};

[[if]] (![[hasInterface]] && ![[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>run on headless clients only</value></part></template>
};</code>
</dd>
</dl>
